articles.title: A(I)gents for Finance: Sci-Fi, reality, and the philosophy of delegated Intelligence
articles.description: AI agents will not transform Finance by being smarter, but by being governable. I tried to dismantles the hype around autonomous agents, reframing them as delegated actors embedded in processes, 	roles, and accountability structures. Without integration and stewardship, agents are not innovation, they are organizational risk.
